info.name: Employees Management
info.description:
This API allows you to manage information of the employees of Axpe Consulting

Contact Support:
 Name: Luis Machado
 Email: LMachadoS@uxcale.com

item.name: Validates de email of an employee

request.description: Validates de email of an employee. Sends the email of the employee which email is in the path and validates if exists or not

response.name: successful response, employee created, returns the information of the created employee
response.body:
{
  "firstName": "R V Xnagjtcrpc Jituhdqey Ytzdgplhymy Jgjpxdxgu P I",

  "email": "e-zz@KACg.UhuGVxjiNMaO",

    "type": "NIF"
  },

response.name: Bad request. The request could not be processed due to invalid input
Unauthorized. Authentication is required or has failed
Forbidden. The client does not have access rights to the content.
Conflict
Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition.
Service unavailable. The server is temporarily unable to handle the request.
Unexpected error
